item.content:encoded: November 24, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is excited to announce the first-ever joint concert headlined by hololive English -Myth- talents Takanashi Kiara and Ninomae Inaâ€™nis. Taking place on March 27th and 28th, 2026 at The Wiltern in Los Angeles, â€œTakanashi Kiara / Ninomae Inaâ€™nis 1st Concert â€˜Drawn to Dawnâ€™â€ will feature various performances from both of the starring talents.Streaming tickets are now on sale from November 24, 2025 onwards on platforms SPWN and Streaming+. Venue tickets for the event will go on sale December 4th at 4:00PM PST.Takanashi Kiara/Ninomae Inaâ€™nis 1st Concert â€œDrawn to Dawnâ€ OverviewTakanashi Kiara/Ninomae Inaâ€™nis 1st Concert â€œDrawn to Dawnâ€ Organized by: COVER Corporation Takanashi Kiara / Ninomae Inaâ€™nis Day 1: Friday, March 27, 2026 Doors Open: 6:30PM / Streaming starts: 7:30PM / Starts: 8:00PM (PDT) Day 2: Saturday, March 28, 2026 Doors Open: 6:30PM / Streaming starts: 7:30PM / Starts: 8:00PM (PDT)ãƒ» Early Entry GA Ticket: $130 ãƒ» GA Ticket: $105 ãƒ» FRONT Loge / FRONT Mezzanine: $160 ãƒ» REAR Loge / MIDDLE Mezzanine: $130 ãƒ» REAR Mezzanine: $95* Venue tickets will be available from December 4, 2025 at 4:00PM (PST)ãƒ» 1-DAY Streaming Ticket: March 27, 2026 (PDT) ãƒ» 1-DAY Streaming Ticket: March 28, 2026 (PDT) ãƒ» 2-DAY Stream Pass: March 27 & 28, 2026 (PDT)â– Streaming Ticket Purchase Links ãƒ» SPWN: https://spwn.jp/events/evt_26032802-engkiarainanis1st ãƒ» Streaming+: https://eplus.jp/takanashikiara_1st-st* Streaming tickets will be sold until April 28, 2026 at 8:00 PM (PDT) * Once the performance has ended and the archive is ready, you will be able to watch the archived stream as much as you like until 11:59 PM April 25, 2026 (PDT) * After 11:59 PM April 28, 2026 (PDT) the performance archive will no longer be available for viewing.Details regarding this concertâ€™s merchandise will be released at a later time, so please stay tuned for future updates via our official social media channels.Upcoming Album Release OverviewTakanashi Kiara and Ninomae Inaâ€™nis are also releasing a new album and EP respectively.

item.title: tsun scoops x hololive English Collaboration Starting on November 23!
item.author: narita
item.content:encoded: November 21, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is excited to announce a collaboration between Californian ice cream parlor tsun scoops and hololive English. This sweet event brings ice cream together with hololive English talents IRyS and FUWAMOCO, as well as a lineup of exclusive merchandise available both online and in-store from November 23 to December 31.During the event, tsun scoops will transform into a dreamy hololive English paradise, decorated with original key visuals of your favorite talent. Three custom flavors inspired by IRyS, Fuwawa Abyssgard, and Mococo Abyssgard will be available for attendees to try, including:: A strawberry sorbet with vanilla ice creamãƒ» Fuwawaffule and Blueberries: Waffle-flavored ice cream with maple syrup and blueberriesãƒ» Mococustard Strawberry Parfait: Custard-flavored ice cream with strawberries and granola tsun scoops, 13137 Brookhurst St., Garden Grove CA 92843 ãƒ» Monday-Friday: 2PM-9PM ãƒ» Saturday-Sunday: 1PM-9PM November 23, 2025 to December 31, 2025 Donâ€™t miss out on exclusive collaboration merchandise featuring IRyS and FUWAMOCO, available on-site during the event as well as online on tsun scoopsâ€™s official website. Items include hoodies, t-shirts, acrylic keychains, acrylic standees, and bowls.tsun scoops is a California-based premium ice cream parlor that has built its reputation through several anime and game collaborations. Proud to be an Asian-owned business, tsun scoops combines anime culture and aesthetics with a range of delicious flavors, including dairy-free options.

item.title: From Three-Dimensional Audio to On-Location Recording: Inside COVERâ€™s Voice Pack Projects Showcasing a Different Side of Talents
item.author: å¹³æ¾æ¢¨æ²™
item.content:encoded: In the Voice Pack Project Team, one staff member takes full responsibility for each project, all the way from the planning stage right through to it going on sale. The process starts with creating a proposal and presenting it internally, and once it gets approved, we send an offer to the talent and move on to developing the script.To go into a little more detail, the staff member in charge also handles things like commissioning jacket illustrations, creating banners for sales pages, and preparing promotional videos and X posts ready for a packâ€™s release.Â There are two main ways we offer voice packs roles to talents. The first is a survey-based approach. For large projects that involve many talents, such as Christmas or Valentineâ€™s Day, we send out a survey in advance to see whoâ€™s interested in participating.The other way is then, of course, individual offers to specific talents. We regularly watch all of the talentsâ€™ streams and look for those who would be a good fit for a particular project weâ€™re planning. Or sometimes it works the other way around â€“ we see something on a stream and realize â€œOh, this talent really likes that kind of theme,â€ and then create a project based on that.Â

item.title: [hololive] Congratulations on the 1st Anniversary! Anniversary campaigns celebrating their journey since debut are being held ev...
hololive production Announces Exclusive Fan Experiences and Live Booth Streams at Anime Frontier, December 12-14!
item.author: narita
item.content:encoded: November 19, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is excited to announce a series of exclusive activities for fans attending at the Fort Worth Convention Center in Fort Worth, Texas. The hololive production booth is the first of its kind in the Texas area, and will be the ultimate destination for fans at the event, with a scheduled lineup of live streaming appearances, engaging activities, and special campaigns that can only be experienced at the event from December 12 to 14. The booth will be located at space , with any updates to be posted on official social media channels.hololive production booth at Anime Frontier 2025 December 12th â€“ 14th, 2025 Fort Worth Convention Center 1201 Houston St, Fort Worth, TX 76102 At the hololive production booth, fans will be able to partake in a host of that will not be broadcasted anywhere else. Participating talents include Airani Iofifteen and Kureiji Ollie from hololive Indonesia; Ouro Kronii, FUWAMOCO, Gigi Murin, and Raora Panthera from hololive English; and Banzoin Hakka, Machina X Flayon, Jurard T Rexford and Octavio from HOLOSTARS English.Attendees can catch their oshis live and in-person as they interact with the crowd and participate in fun activities right on the show floor. Look forward to the full streaming schedule coming soon on SNS!â– hololive Meet Memorial Stamps & Freebies The booth will also serve as a stop for the hololive Meet campaign. Fans can collect a Free Memorial Stamp as well as a featuring the latest official illustration for hololive Meet 2025. Additionally, Special Video Messages from this yearâ€™s hololive Meet Ambassadors will be played on-site for all attendees to enjoy!An event-exclusive hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME English Edition PR Card featuring the hololive STAGE World Tour â€˜25 -Synchronize!- Key Visual will be distributed to booth visitors as a special thank you to hololive production and TCG enthusiasts alike.â– hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME (hOCG) English Edition Experience Want to learn the ins and outs of the new hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME in English? hololive production has prepared a dedicated space for new players to try their hand at the hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME at our booth, where experienced staff will guide newcomers through the gameplay.Participants of our teaching space will receive a â€œMonthly Tournament Pack vol.1â€ hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME PR Card Pack, as thanks for joining in.â– holoplus Special Campaign Attendees are encouraged to elevate their Anime Frontier experience through our official fan app, . Over the weekend, fans will have access to the Anime Frontier Exclusive Corner, available only for the duration of the event. More information can be found in-appâ€“ be sure to check it out and spread your excitement!â– Official Social Media Links Be sure to keep an eye on Anime Frontierâ€™s official social media accounts to stay up-to-date on any changes and upcoming events with hololive production!About Anime Frontier Presented by CrunchyrollCreated by LeftField Media (the creators of the award-winning largest anime show on the east coast: Anime NYC), Anime Frontier is set in Fort Worth, TX, a city that blends cosmopolitan energy and cowboy culture, Anime Frontier Presented By Crunchyroll brings together the best of the US and Japan for a showcase of whatâ€™s next in Japanese entertainment. Featuring some of the biggest guests in anime and manga and leading publishers internationally to Texas, Anime Frontier is three days of exciting exhibits, exclusive premieres, and show-stopping special events. Join us for a convention unlike any other in Texas! For more, visit AnimeFrontier.com.

Additionally, Special Video Messages from this yearâ€™s hololive Meet Ambassadors will be played on-site for all attendees to enjoy!An event-exclusive hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME English Edition PR Card featuring the hololive STAGE World Tour â€˜25 -Synchronize!- Key Visual will be distributed to booth visitors as a special thank you to hololive production and TCG enthusiasts alike.â– hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME (hOCG) English Edition Experience Want to learn the ins and outs of the new hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME in English? hololive production has prepared a dedicated space for new players to try their hand at the hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME at our booth, where experienced staff will guide newcomers through the gameplay.Participants of our teaching space will receive a â€œMonthly Tournament Pack vol.1â€ hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME PR Card Pack, as thanks for joining in.â– holoplus Special Campaign Attendees are encouraged to elevate their Anime Frontier experience through our official fan app, . Over the weekend, fans will have access to the Anime Frontier Exclusive Corner, available only for the duration of the event. More information can be found in-appâ€“ be sure to check it out and spread your excitement!â– Official Social Media Links Be sure to keep an eye on Anime Frontierâ€™s official social media accounts to stay up-to-date on any changes and upcoming events with hololive production!About Anime Frontier Presented by CrunchyrollCreated by LeftField Media (the creators of the award-winning largest anime show on the east coast: Anime NYC), Anime Frontier is set in Fort Worth, TX, a city that blends cosmopolitan energy and cowboy culture, Anime Frontier Presented By Crunchyroll brings together the best of the US and Japan for a showcase of whatâ€™s next in Japanese entertainment. Featuring some of the biggest guests in anime and manga and leading publishers internationally to Texas, Anime Frontier is three days of exciting exhibits, exclusive premieres, and show-stopping special events. Join us for a convention unlike any other in Texas! For more, visit AnimeFrontier.com.

item.title: Twitch x hololive production â€œholodayâ€ New Details Revealed
item.author: narita
item.content:encoded: November 18, 2025, Tokyo, Japan â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Motoaki Tanigo) is pleased to share new details about the upcoming Twitch x hololive production â€œholodayâ€ event, taking place on November 20, 2025 (PST).In addition to the main â€œholodayâ€ celebration, Twitch will host a â€œVTuber Weekâ€ leading up to the event, featuring a multi-day showcase that celebrates the creativity and charm of VTubers around the world, including members of hololive production. This exciting collaboration between Twitch and hololive productions aims to introduce a wider global audience to the world of hololive talents through exciting streams, custom emotes, and a series of engaging campaigns.VTuber Week (Pre-holoday)Leading up to holoday, Twitch will release a series of unique videos and social posts designed to highlight the diverse talents of VTubers. VTuber Week will launch with a dynamic video featuring VTubers as heroic characters embarking on new and exciting adventures on the platform.Platforms: Twitch front page, Apple App Store, and Google Play Blog Post: A dedicated Twitch blog will introduce VTuber Week and holoday to users worldwideholoday (November 20, PST)On holoday featured talents of hololive production will take over Twitchâ€™s front page and top shelf with a series of live streams and special appearances. Fans can join the celebration and earn exclusive limited-time emotes, which includes the return of the popular YAGOO Global Emote.â– YAGOO Bronze/Silver/Gold Emotes (3 types) Unlockable by watching hololive talents on Twitch (earnable for 24 hours on November 20) ãƒ» Yagoo (Bronze YAGOO): Watch 15mins total ãƒ» Sadgoo (Silver YAGOO): Watch 1 hour total ãƒ» Kingoo (Gold YAGOO): Watch 3 hours totalUsable from November 20 to December 20, 2025 (PST)â– Talent Emotes (16 types) Unlockable by watching each participating channel for 60 minutes Earnable from November 20â€“30, usable until December 20, 2025 (PST)Twitch will also feature hololive production talents across the front page and carousel banners throughout the day, showcasing a large-scale collaboration between the two communities.Event Overview: Twitch x hololive production â€œholodayâ€ (Same lineup as announced in the October 29 release, including members of hololive Indonesia, hololive English, and HOLOSTARS English)

item.title: Ueda Shuhei, COVER Director, on the Journey Toward Becoming an Essential Presence in the Global Content Industry
item.author: cover_hirata
item.content:encoded: I believe that our greatest strength lies in the incredible passion of our fans. At hololive production, streaming is at the core of what we do. Those streams ignite enthusiasm among our viewers, which then carries over to music concerts, creating a powerful cycle of energy and connection. At those live events, fans come together again and celebrate a common passion, and that passion continues to spread, building a strong sense of unity throughout the community. The thought of how we can carry that passion forward and make it resonate with fans around the world is incredibly exciting.The atmosphere at trading card game tournaments is a little more subdued than that of live concerts, yet itâ€™s common to see players meeting for the first time start their conversations with a question like, â€œWhoâ€™s your ?â€, leading to spontaneous interactions among fans. The more touchpoints fans have with each other in different settings, the more the community grows, and thatâ€™s where we see exciting chemistry start to build.Â Itâ€™s precisely because of such incredible passion from our fans that weâ€™re able to explore many different business opportunities to attempt to meet their expectations. We took on a new challenge in the trading card game space last year, and starting next fiscal year, weâ€™ll be launching a full-scale game business as well. By responding to our fansâ€™ desire for new kinds of experiences, and by offering opportunities that differ from what weâ€™ve done before, weâ€™re able to create entirely new ways for them to enjoy and engage with our content.Â Iâ€™ve been in the entertainment industry for a long time, but Iâ€™ve never seen this level of passion anywhere else. Meeting fans in person and feeling their energy firsthand is incredibly inspiring for me. Thatâ€™s why I make a point to attend every live concert I can, and I also try to visit trading card game tournaments and shop events whenever possible.

item.title: iPASS x hololive production â€œhololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony iPASS Card Blind Pack IIIâ€ available from November 26!
item.author: narita
item.content:encoded: November 13, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced a follow-up collaboration with iPASS Corporation (Kaohsiung City, Taiwan; CEO: Keynes Cheng), releasing the third edition of their hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony blind pack series.Following the overwhelming success and buzz generated by the first two blind pack releases, iPASS Corporation continues the excitement with the â€œhololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony Transparent Card Blind Pack IIIâ€ which features 20 hololive production talents and a secret edition card limited to 1,500 pieces worldwide. The third wave of blind packs will be available exclusively at 7-ELEVEN stores in Taiwan from Wednesday, November 26, 2025, once again satisfying the passionate collecting desires of hololive production fans everywhere.As an official sponsor of â€œhololive SUPER EXPO 2025â€ and â€œhololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmonyâ€, iPASS Corporation actively brings the charm of virtual talents into everyday life by creating transportation cards that combine both practical use and collectible value.This Transparent Card Blind Pack series is officially licensed by â€œhololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony 2025,â€ and features exquisite transparent card craftsmanship and unique character-based designs. The collection allows fans to carry and treasure their favorite hololive production talentsâ€™ most dazzling stage moments wherever they go.The third installment of the blind pack series features a total of 20 hololive production talents along with one limited secret edition, including: Tokino Sora, Robocosan, Aki Rosenthal, Shirakami Fubuki, Nakiri Ayame, Yuzuki Choco, Oozora Subaru, Ookami Mio, Sakura Miko, Nekomata Okayu, Inugami Korone, Yukihana Lamy, Shishiro Botan, Airani Iofifteen, Anya Melfissa, Vestia Zeta, Ninomae Inaâ€™nis, Gawr Gura, Ouro Kronii, and Nanashi Mumei. This lineup spans multiple generations and branches across hololive production, making it a must-have collection for fans.The highlight of this release is the extremely rare secret edition, limited to only 1,500 pieces worldwide, destined to become a highly sought-after treasure among fans.According to iPASS Corporation, the company continues to deepen its collaboration with hololive production by not only expanding the diversity and reach of transportation card applications and partnerships, but also actively bridging different audiences and market segments, bringing fans even more excitement and surprises through every new release.All hololive production enthusiasts are encouraged to set their alarms and head to their nearest 7-ELEVEN in Taiwan on , to try their luck and bring home their favorite idol card!The iPASS card is a convenient electronic wallet in Taiwan for cashless payments. You can use this small and easy card for many transactions such as for public transport, convenience stores, shops, malls. You can buy various goods and services with the iPASS card.

item.title: Octopus x hololive Gen 3 Virtual Cards are Available from November 7th!
item.author: narita
item.content:encoded: November 7, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced a new collaboration between hololive production and Octopus Card Limited, introducing exclusive virtual card images featuring hololive Generation 3 talents: Usada Pekora, Shiranui Flare, Shirogane Noel, and Houshou Marine.This collaboration presents a unique â€œNext stop, Hong Kongâ€ theme, showcasing four hololive talents in specially designed autumn-winter school uniforms while experiencing Hong Kongâ€™s iconic transportation systems.The virtual card images are now available for purchase through the Octopus Card Image Storeã€€starting from November 7th, 2025, at HK$38 each.In addition to the virtual card images, physical Octopus cards and limited edition merchandise will be released in the near future. Fans are encouraged to stay tuned to official social media channels for upcoming announcements regarding product details and release schedules.Octopus is a contactless stored value card that provides customers with a simple, safe, and secure way to pay. First launched in 1997 across public transport systems, the applications of the Octopus card have since expanded to include retail stores and various facilities, making everyday life more convenient.

item.title: Ducky x hololive English FUWAMOCO Releases Limited Edition Keyboard to Celebrate 2nd Anniversary on October 31!
item.author: narita
item.content:encoded: October 31, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) are collaborating with mechanical keyboard brand Ducky in celebration of two years with FUWAMOCO. Ducky has produced a collectible edition of their popular One 2 keyboard featuring twins Fuwawa Abyssgard and Mococo Abyssgard from hololive English -Advent-.Only 1000 units of the Ducky x hololive English One 2 RGB FUWAMOCO Limited Edition Keyboard are available worldwide, engraved with a unique serial number on a metal plate. This exclusive collaboration includes a matching mousepad and novelty keycaps that bring a pastel touch to any setup. The keyboard launches on October 31, 2025 with allocations in the United States, Japan and other territories.For more information, please visit Duckyâ€™s official social media accounts and distribution page. PBT Dye-Sub Keycaps with English and Hiragana legends Full Case Illustrations by Mitarashi NekoDucky is a prominent manufacturer of mechanical keyboards and peripherals. They are committed to creating top-notch professional keyboards and mice with exceptional quality. With partners in over 50 countries, Ducky strives to create products that are not just your average PC peripherals but also works of art by blending cultural traditions with state-of-the-art technology. It is their mission to meet the needs of users and collectors.

item.title: Usada Pekora x KING TO NIN JIOM Collaboration Goods Available for Pre-Order from October 31!
item.author: narita
item.content:encoded: October 31, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) and KING TO NIN JIOM have released an exclusive merchandise line featuring hololive production talent Usada Pekora. Fans can pre-order goods and exclusive merchandise sets starting from today, October 31.The theme of this collaboration is â€œVoice Protection.â€ CAPSULE has tailor-made merchandise for hololive production talent Usada Pekora, based on the theme Pekoraâ€™s own favorite voice protection item: KING TO NIN JIOM. The collaboration showcases products inspired by Usada Pekoraâ€™s energetic smile and Chinese motifs, with character art featuring two limited-edition outfits. From cute acrylic standees to practical everyday items, limited-edition merchandise full of Pekoraâ€™s charm is about to debutâ€”get ready for the arrival of â€œVoice Protection Charm! Peko!â€ Pre-orders begin on Friday, October 31.Whether itâ€™s the badges shining with Pekoraâ€™s signature smile, the high-quality acrylic standees, or the talking sitting plushie, each item is designed to make you want to collect the whole set.â– Taiwan-Exclusive Merchandiseâ– Japan-Exclusive MerchandiseIn addition to the new visual merchandise, this collaboration has prepared a variety of set options:* Images are for reference only. Please refer to the actual products. * Styles for random items cannot be specified. ãƒ» Voice Protection Charm, Peko! Set A (NTD250) â€“ Includes limited-edition storage tin box, random badge, and limited-edition stickers. ãƒ» Voice Protection Charm, Peko! Set B (NTD399) â€“ Includes random charm, PVC cleaning cloth charm, and acrylic card. ãƒ» Voice Protection Charm, Peko! Guardian Gift Pack (NTD1499) â€“ An integrated set with multiple merchandise items, including a character art standee, badges, stickers, a candyâ€™s set, and other rich content. ãƒ» Letâ€™s protect our voices together, Peko! A Set (Â¥2500) â€“ Includes a PVC clear pouch with zipper, trading acrylic clear card, and a full-print acrylic stand. ãƒ» Letâ€™s protect our voices together, Peko! B Set (Â¥3500) â€“ Includes a candy tin, trading stickers, trading pin badge, 2-in-1 chibi acrylic stand, and a trading hot-stamped illustration card.

item.title: [hololive] Collaboration with a major green tea maker! A collaboration featuring Juufuutei Raden, who has been selected as the g...
Twitch x hololive production Collaboration Online Event â€œholodayâ€
item.author: Horii
item.content:encoded: October 29, 2025, Tokyo, Japan â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Motoaki Tanigo) is excited to announce the very first official online collaboration event with Twitch, which will be held on November 20, 2025 (PST).Twitch, the global leading live streaming service that empowers communities to create and watch together, is collaborating with hololive production to bring talents hololive fans know and love to the platform. Talents from hololive Indonesia, hololive English, and HOLOSTARS English will take over the front page of Twitch for an all-day the â€œholodayâ€ celebration.To celebrate hololive talents making their debut on Twitch, viewers will be able to obtain a limited-time Global Emote featuring COVER Corporationâ€™s CEO, Motoaki Tanigo. Fans can look forward to a variety of fun streams hosted by the participating talents during the online event.Get ready for â€œholodayâ€, a special all-day event where hololive production talents will take over Twitch like never before! We hope youâ€™re as excited as we are.Event Overview: Twitch x hololive production â€œholodayâ€

item.title: hololive Indonesia Fan Festival @ Comic Frontier 21 will be held on November 15-16, 2025!
item.author: narita
item.content:encoded: October 28, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€” COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan, CEO: Motoaki Tanigo) announced today that hololive Indonesia Fan Festival @ Comic Frontier 21 will be held on November 15-16, 2025, at Indonesia Convention Exhibition (ICE) BSD City in Tangerang Selatan, Indonesia.EXPLORE hololive Indonesia AT COMIFURO 21 A special dedicated zone for hololive Indonesia Fan Festival will be located in Hall 10 of the ICE. The zone will include booths related to hololive Indonesia, from official booths to sponsor booths. There will also be many activities, including stamp rally, for visitors to join that will enhance their experience as hololive Indonesia fans! The hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future, Meet and Greet with all hololive Indonesia talents, and hololive Meet stage with Vestia Zeta and Kaela Kovalskia will be held at the same weekend at Comic Frontier 21!THE FUN CONTINUES OFF-SITE Fans of hololive Indonesia can keep the Fan Festival energy high with tie-in activities outside the venue, too, like restaurant collaboration and Illustration Contest!hololive Indonesia Fan Festival @ Comic Frontier 21 Overview November 15-16, 2025 Indonesia Convention Exhibition (ICE) BSD City Hall 10 Jl. BSD Grand Boulevard No.1, Pagedangan, Kec. Pagedangan, Kabupaten Tangerang, Bantenâ– hololive Indonesia Fan Festival Booth #: 1101 (Hall 10) A booth to celebrate the fansâ€™ five years of love and passion towards hololive Indonesia. Take photos with the standees from hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future, and also check out various exhibits that make you reminisce about hololive Indonesiaâ€™s journey! There will also be a message board wall for fans to write their hopes for hololive Indonesia in the future, so be sure to leave your wish!ãƒ» hololive Indonesia Fan Festival Stamp Rally Stamp cards will be distributed at the booth, and attendees can collect stamps by visiting the booths of hololive Indonesia partner companies in the hololive Indonesia Fan Festival zone. Participants who collect all stamps on their card may be eligible to receive the hololive Indonesia Fan Festival Sticker Set!â– hololive production Official Merchandise Booth #: 1102 (Hall 10) Fans can purchase official live merchandise (Made in Indonesia Edition) at the booth. As a purchase bonus, customers will also receive a random postcard. Image is just for illustrative purposes only, design is subject to change.Anime Collective Lab (ACL)â– Merchandise Booth #: 1103 (Hall 10)Fans can purchase special collaboration merchandise between ACL and hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future.ãƒ» ACL x hololive ID Pop Up Cafe: S1-S2 (F&B Area) At this Pop Up Cafe, fans can enjoy local food and drinks themed around hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future.ACL is also planning to have collaboration with a Japanese Restaurant, Umakatta Gading Serpong, where fans can enjoy a special collaboration menu featuring hololive Indonesia. For more information on the above booth and collaboration, follow: https://www.instagram.com/animecollectivelabâ– Pocky x hololive Indonesia Booth #: 1104a (Hall 10) At this booth, fans can purchase Pocky sets bundled with Pocky X hololive ID Collectible Photocard (3 Pocky for 1 photocard). Not only that, fans can also participate in Gacha Machine corner to win a hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future-themed merchandise. Fans who either purchase a Pocky set or play in Gacha Machine will have access to take a photo in a special Pocky X hololive ID Photo Booth. For latest information, follow: https://www.instagram.com/pockyidâ– Booth #: 1104b (Hall 10) Fans can purchase hololive Indonesia x Manekineko collaboration merchandise in this booth. Further merchandise announcements will be made in November, 2025. For latest information, follow Manekineko Indonesia official instagram: https://www.instagram.com/manekineko_indonesiahololive Indonesia FAN FESTIVAL STAMP RALLY 15-16 November, 2025 ãƒ» Pick up a stamp rally card at the hololive Indonesia Fan Festival Booth (Booth no. 1101). ãƒ» Fulfill the conditions outlined for each booth and obtain a stamp from the booth staff. ãƒ» Come back to the hololive production booth and show us your stamp card to redeem the hololive Indonesia Fan Festival Sticker Set prize!â– PARTICIPATING PARTNER BOOTHS AND REQUIREMENTS ãƒ» hololive production Official Merchandise Booth (#1102): Visit the Booth ãƒ» Anime Collective Lab (ACL) Booth (#1103): Take a photo in front of the booth and upload an Instagram story while tagging @animecollectivelab * ãƒ» ACL x hololive ID Pop-up Cafe (F&B Area S1-S2): Follow ACL official Instagram ãƒ» Booth Pocky x hololive Indonesia Booth (# 1104a): Follow Pocky ID official social media (Instagram or TikTok) ãƒ» Booth Karaoke Manekineko (# 1104b): Follow Karaoke Manekineko official Instagram* In the event of insufficient internet connection on-site, a screenshot of the stamp condition may also be accepted.â– hololive Meet: Meet and Greet All members from hololive Indonesia will be having a meet and greet session! Go check the details and schedule at: https://x.com/comifuro Vestia Zeta and Kaela Kovalskia from hololive Indonesia 3rd Generation will be appearing on Comic Frontier 21 Main Stage! It will be their first appearance together in Indonesia. Date: Sunday, November 16, 2025 (WIB) 16:00-17:00hololive Indonesia Art Battle! To commemorate hololive Indonesia 5th year anniversary, â€œhololive Indonesia Art Battleâ€ illustration contest will be held on the illustration, manga, and novel submission platform pixiv from November 4 to December 15, 2025 (JST).Limited-edition clear files featuring the official key visual will be distributed at the hololive Production Official Merchandise Booth. A total of 1,000 copies will be distributed per day, available while supplies last.

item.title: Summer Internship 2025: Learning About Business Strategy and Production
item.author: cover_hirata
item.content:encoded: What is COVERâ€™s Summer Internship?It was another scorching hot summer this year â€“ how did everyone spend it?In mid-August, COVER held a three-day hands-on Summer Internship program designed for students to experience business production and learn how to structure business development through practical exercises. Through the program, participants had the opportunity to experience the actual process of creating new business ideas, particularly in the entertainment industry, and to receive direct feedback from upper management. The internship aims to give students a firsthand understanding of COVERâ€™s approach to business strategy and how new projects are brought to life.Â We spoke with the team in charge of the Summer Internship to learn more about its purpose.Â Â â€œThe purpose of this program is to give participating students the opportunity to learn and experience the following three key aspects:To understand the strategic thinking and processes behind management within the entertainment industryTo experience the planning and development processes of business projects within the entertainment fieldTo gain a firsthand understanding of COVERâ€™s new business creation centered on VTubers, while receiving mentorship and feedback from professionals on-site.Â Thatâ€™s why, for the Summer Internship 2025, we set a clear goal: to deliver presentations from multiple perspectives and receive direct feedback from the executive team.Â At COVER, the Corporate Planning Division plays a vital role in, not simply coming up with ideas, but bringing those ideas to life, supporting them, putting them on a stable trajectory and ensuring they are profitable. Through this internship, we wanted students to understand the process and approach required to turn a business concept into reality as we believe that understanding this kind of thinking and workflow will serve them well in any career path they pursue â€“ whether as working professionals or as future members of a corporate planning team.â€Experiencing Business Production in COVERâ€™s Corporate Planning DivisionSo what exactly did the Summer Internship 2025 look like?This yearâ€™s program invited nine students, who were divided into teams of three, to take on a three-day challenge in business production.Here is how the three-day program unfolded:Â Day 1 â€• Group Work BeginsThe program kicked off with an opening meeting, followed by introductions to members of the Corporate Planning Division who would be supporting the students as mentors throughout the internship. After a casual lunch where everyone got to know each other a little better, the mentors gave an overview of COVERâ€™s main areas of business, adjacent industries, and potential markets before students were divided into their respective teams and their group work finally began!Day 2 â€• Creating Proposals for a New Businessâ€Day 2 began with a quick morning meeting before diving straight into group work. Students were not just merely coming up with business ideas â€“ if they stayed as â€œpie-in-the-skyâ€ concepts, the experience would not have been quite as meaningful. With guidance from their mentors, students learned how to analyze businesses, design new business plans, and evaluate profitability and risk, as they continued to expand and shape their ideas. The group work continued after lunch, and the day wrapped up with progress reports and feedback sessions as everyone prepared for the final presentations.Â Day 3 â€• Bringing It All Together: Presenting Before the Executive TeamThe final day also began with group work after the customary morning meeting. To ensure each groupâ€™s well-thought-out business ideas came across clearly, mentors shared tips on how to deliver effective presentations and helped the students refine their proposal materials. At 5 p.m. on the final day, the presentations began with CEO Tanigo and other members of the executive team in attendance.Â Final Day Presentation ReportSummer Internship presentations were governed by three main rules: (1) 15 minutes for the presentation and 5 minutes for Q&A, (2) strict time management, (3) no updates to the materials after submission. With those rules in place, each team arrived early at the venue alongside their mentors from the Corporate Planning Division to carefully go over their presentation materials.As the clock neared 5 p.m. and the presentations were about to begin, members of the executive team started to fill out the venue one after another; the interns focused and determined. The session began with each team giving their presentation, followed by Q&A sessions with the executives. After a short break, the event concluded with the awarding of the Excellence Award and feedback from CEO Tanigo.Proposals included a social contribution project that utilizes COVERâ€™s motion tracking technology to digitize and pass down the skills of experienced professionals, an immersive theme park concept where fans and talents can go between each otherâ€™s worlds, and a digital tabletop figure device designed to enhance and support fansâ€™ activities.During the feedback session, executives praised the students for their fresh perspectives and out-of-the-box thinking when coming up with ideas not bound by the conventions of the VTuber industry, as well as the feasibility of their proposals. ThisÂ also served as the perfect opportunity for executives to share their insights on COVERâ€™s vision for the future and offering practical advice on how to approach business planning.Â Looking Back on Summer Internship 2025Feedback from ParticipantsWe received feedback from perspectives weâ€™d never considered before. It really made me realize the sincerity behind the advice we were given.Â It was an invaluable experience to hear directly from the companyâ€™s top executives.Through this experience, I learned that creating a business isnâ€™t just about coming up with ideas. Itâ€™s about analyzing successful cases, understanding their core elements, and finding ways to differentiate them. The insights I gained here will definitely help shape my future approach to business.I was able to move past surface-level trends for success and develop a more fundamental way of thinking. Getting direct feedback from the executives also helped me understand how real business decisions are made: something that will surely be a major asset in my career.Â The mentoring sessions were especially meaningful. Every conversation was packed with insights and learning.Reflections from the Program CoordinatorOn the Final Day PresentationsWhat stood out was how seriously each team considered the question â€œWhy COVER be the one to take on this business idea?â€Their approaches were truly diverse â€“ some worked backward from COVERâ€™s strengths, others analyzed markets that could be accessed from our existing areas of business, and some made sure their ideas were grounded in solid reasoning to address real-world challenges. Rather than simply envisioning a â€œNew business,â€ they kept asking themselves what it truly means for COVER to lead such an initiative giving depth and credibility to every proposal, which is what left the strongest impression on me.Â What stood out to me was how each team built their projects around open discussions. Every memberâ€™s ideas could be seen in the final presentations â€“ a true reflection of how well they collaborated.We also held a short mid-program sharing session, where each team had five minutes to share their progress, challenges, and proposed solutions. Hearing other teamsâ€™ perspectives sparked new ideas and helped participants have a fresh take on their own projects and spot missing elements in their own proposals, expanding the scope of their learning. The sharing session encouraged more open communication within and across teams, which I believe ultimately led to higher quality presentations.COVER continues to grow under its mission, â€œTogether, Letâ€™s Create Culture Loved by All,â€ driven by the challenge of elevating VTubers into a culture loved by people around the world. COVERâ€™s greatest strength lies in its personnel â€“ professionals from diverse backgrounds in creative, business, and technology, who respect and inspire one another and work together to achieve a common goal.Â This internship offers a special opportunity to experience the passion and business innovation that drive COVER.Weâ€™re excited to see the participants go on to create that inspires people around the world together with COVER!Â
